title: DOOM PATROL Season 2 Ending Explained + Season 3 Theories!
author: Think Story
comment: No wonder the ending felt short, Covid 19 is ruining everything.
Karate jesus was a great twist

Miranda is daddy, you can hear jigsaw puzzle pieces when she comes out of the well, she probably came out as Miranda from the well because all of them were in grief and it would be probably easier to convince them he was Miranda. (I am saying Daddy probably went back in the well and took Miranda's form, there was no Candlemaker involved and it was just Daddy's plan to become Miranda)
This actually did feel like a cliffhanger finale. Although it would have been a million times better to get some closure, they picked a good episode to end on.
Nah candle maker has nothing to with miranda I feel it. This is a whole other ball game and I'm shook.
description:
We take a deep dive into DC and HBO Max's "Doom Patrol" season 2 to analyze its ending, discuss season 3, and some of the things you may have missed along the way! Who is controlling Miranda? Who is the Candlemaker?
